    • userExists

      public void userExists(String username, String pwd) throws Exception
      Method that checks if a user exists by trying to create a connection with the user's credentials
      Parameters:
      username - String The name of the user
      pwd - String The password of the user
      Throws:
      Exception - If a connection wasn't able to be established due to not finding the user, or any other reasons, the method throws an Exception

      username - String The name of the new user
      pwd - String The password of the new user
      Throws:
      Exception - A common Exception with a specific message to describe if something went wrong with the creation of the user

    • executeQuery

      public DefaultTableModel executeQuery(String query) throws Exception
      Method that executes a query and formats its return into a DefaultTableModel object
      Parameters:
      query - String The query specifying the information to retrieve from the database
      Returns:
      DefaultTableModel The return of the query formatted into a DefaultTableModel object, fit for a JTable component
      Throws:
      Exception - A common Exception with a specific message to describe if something went wrong when executing the query or formatting the data

    • createTableQuery

      private String createTableQuery(String headerCSV)
      Method that mounts a dynamic Create Table Query based on the header of a csv file
      Parameters:
      headerCSV - String The header of the csv file from which the query is going to be created
      Returns:
      String A Create Table query with the fields contained in the csv header

    • createInsertQuery

      private String createInsertQuery(String headerCSV)
      Method that mounts a dynamic Insert Query based on the header of a csv file
      Parameters:
      headerCSV - String The header of the csv file from which the query is going to be created
      Returns:
      String An insert query with the fields contained in the csv header

    • createXMLFiles

      private void createXMLFiles(ArrayList<classes.Country> countries) throws ParserConfigurationException, TransformerException
      Method that creates an XML file for every Country object contained in an ArrayList
      Parameters:
      countries - ArrayList List with all the objects that are going to be written
      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException - If there is an Exception when trying to write the files
      TransformerException - If there is an Exception when trying to write the files

    • readCSV

      private ArrayList<classes.Country> readCSV(String routeCSV) throws IOException
      Method that reads a csv file and creates objects with the content of the file
      Parameters:
      routeCSV - String The route where the csv file is located
      Returns:
      ArrayList List with all the Country objects retrieved from the csv file
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an Exception when trying to read the file

    • readXML

      private ArrayList<classes.Country> readXML() throws IOException, SAXException, ParserConfigurationException
      Method that reads a number of XML files and creates objects with the content of the files
      Returns:
      ArrayList List with all the Country objects retrieved from the XML files
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an Exception when trying to read the files
      SAXException - If there is an Exception when trying to read the files
      ParserConfigurationException - If there is an Exception when trying to read the files

      Parameters:
      csvText - String Text to write
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an Exception when trying to write the text
